features: WITH 2% GLYCOLIC ACID - Glycolic Acid, an AHA, is known to help shed dead skin cells.
FRAGRANCE & ALCOHOL-FREE - This toner is Fragrance Free, Alcohol Free, Dermatologist Tested, Cruelty Free and great for normal to combination skin.
GENTLY DETOXIFIES - This toner gently detoxifies by deep cleaning pores and gently exfoliates to prep skin for moisture.
GOOD FOR SKIN & THE PLANET - This product is Dermatologist Tested, Cruelty Free, Vegan Friendly and Carbon Neutral.
WITH WILLOW BARK EXTRACT - Our detox toner is formulated with Willow Bark Extract which is known to soothe skin.
body.description: After cleansing, gently exfoliate and prep your skin for moisture with the Bioré Clean Detox Toner. This toner is formulated with 2% Glycolic Acid, an AHA, which is known to help shed dead skin cells. The formula also contains Green Tea Extract, known to have antioxidant properties, and Willow Bark Extract, known to smooth skin. This toner is for normal to combination skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1: Bioré Clean Detox Gentle Cleanser Formulated with green tea extract, a known antioxidant, this cleanser gently detoxifies by deep cleaning dirt, oil, and pollution from your pores for fresh, breathable skin. Great for normal to combination skin, our formula helps combat congested pores with a gentle daily detox that is fragrance and paraben free. Remove daily grime, dirt, and oil and give your skin a deep cleansing detox with Bioré Clean Detox Gentle Cleanser as step one in your skincare routine. Step 2: Bioré Clean Detox Toner After cleansing, gently exfoliate and prep your skin for moisture with the Bioré Clean Detox Toner. This toner is alcohol free, fragrance free and paraben free. It is formulated with 2% Glycolic Acid, an AHA, which is known to help shed dead skin cells. The formula also contains Green Tea Extract, known to have antioxidant properties, and Willow Bark Extract, known to smooth skin. This toner is for normal to combination skin. Step 3: Bioré Clean Detox Daily Moisturizer Bioré Clean Detox Daily Moisturizer is fragrance free and formulated with Bakuchiol, a natural alternative to Retinol and is great for normal to combination skin. Our formula, with Vitamins E & B3 (Niacinamide) which is known to smooth the appearance of skin, provides lightweight moisture that won’t clog pores. Hydrate your skin with Bioré Clean Detox Daily Moisturizer for a lightweight, clean feel and soft, smooth skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new daily moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: My skin: early 40's, combination skin that is incredibly sensitive and reacts to practically everything. I steer clear of anything with fragrances added, both so that I don't trigger a skin reaction and to avoid headaches, eye reactions, etc.My favorite moisturizer until now was a Korean brand that's about 3 times as expensive as this for the same size bottle, so I was always on the lookout for something to replace it. And this is it!After about 4-5 months of using it I can say:It's not too heavy, but not too light either, so I feel like I'll be able to use it year round with no problems.Absorbs fast! I live in the south and haven't had any instances of it feeling like it's melting off my face when I take the dog for a walk right after doing my skincare routine. (I do put sunscreen on over it, but thankfully they play nice together without it feeling like i've got a ton of product on my face.)You don't need to use a lot so it lasts a decent amount of time despite the size of the bottle.Has no scent, and most importantly triggered no reactions whatsoever for me. I also didn't need to wait for my skin to "get used to it", it works for me the same now as it did when I first bought it, which is kind of rare for me.So if you're sensitive I suggest giving it a try! At the very least if it manages to not be right for you, you at least haven't spent $20+ to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best cleanser I have ever used. Cleans my face really well without drying. Please keep selling this here 🙏🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No residue after
reviews.reviewText: This seems I guess what they would call “lightweight”. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling greasy, which was my main concern. Absorbs nicely and does the job. Can’t say I’ve noticed any long term benefits but I also dont use it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleanses well without drying
reviews.reviewText: I’ve grown to trust the Biore brand for offering quality skin care products at an affordable price. This facial cleanser is no exception. It cleans my sensitive skin well, with no irritation or drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I was disappointed 😞
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a moisturizer for my face, but it doesn't penatrate into my skin. It leaves a layer of substance on my skin. It was a waste of money 😔 I don't recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have bought this for my daughter twice she loves it! And uses it daily. Happy with product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for oily/combination skin!
reviews.reviewText: Moisturizer is great; non greasy, fragrance free, noncomedigic. Bought the whole detox line and loving it. I have mature, oily skin and live in the Florida heat. These products are perfect. Not enough moisture for dry skin tho. If you're oily/combo, try them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not best for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Mi used to to use the biore daily detox with cannabis sativa in it and that was amazing. It got rid of all texture and cleaned out my pores. They discontinued that and I tried this one. Right away I noticed it felt like it was stinging my face And by the end of the week I had a little breakouts. I am sensitive to most products and suffer from very mild rosacea so this was just one of the products that does not agree with my sensitive skin. So if you have similar issues, I do recommend staying away from this product . Also not a fan of the smell. The best way I could describe it is that it kind of smells like clay
